title: Loan Facility of US $100 million from China Development Bank Corporation to Finance the Improvement and Rehabilitation of Priority Roads Project 3 (Phase II)
decision_details: -  the proposal made by H.E. the President, in his capacity as the Minister of Finance and Planning, to proceed with the activities relating to loan arrangements to finance the Improvement and Rehabilitation of Priority Roads Project 3 (Phase II),  was approved by the Cabinet.
